Lockeese The key is read by Lock ID of application for key exchange Email Password (optional) Sign in or register Sign in This email address is invalid This password is too short This password is incorrect This field is required "Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions." //Strings on ListOfLocksActivity RecyclerViewLOLActivity Go to List of Keys My List of locks enter username here List_of_locks LOCKS From DB Look who has access key \u0009 It is important to be aware of what personal data this app collects and how the data are used and managed. We respect yours right to be forgotten what means you can request us to delete your data.
    What data we are asking for?

- we do require only username and password which can be sensitive so you should not disclosed them to the third parties, remember you can always reset your credentials if you are afraid they have been compromised
    Where is data stored?
-all necessary data required for proper functioning is stored on Firebase
    How is data secured?
- when communicating within system data is encrypted Agree 1 2 3
